headline: Toddler Is Rescued 65 Hours After Turkey Earthquake
text: A 3-year-old girl — her tiny frame wrapped in a foil blanket, her face and hair caked with dust — wrapped her small hand around the gloved thumb of a rescue worker and looked into his face with wide eyes.
snippet: Elif Perincek, 3, clung to the hand of one of her rescuers as she was lifted from her collapsed home in Izmir.
